message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested but $15000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  Would you be willing to come down to $12000?
I understand your concerns, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at 13500?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, $13500 is still a bit higher than my budget. How about we settle on $13000?
I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at 13250?
